tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_on_off_budget AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id, CASE WHEN (acv.id IS NULL) THEN 'Unallocated'::text ELSE (acv.category_value)::text END AS budget, acv.id AS budget_id FROM (((amp_activities_categoryvalues aac JOIN amp_category_value acv ON ((aac.amp_categoryvalue_id = acv.id))) JOIN amp_category_class acc ON (((acc.id = acv.amp_category_class_id) AND ((acc.keyname)::text = 'activity_budget'::text)))) RIGHT JOIN amp_activity a ON ((a.amp_activity_id = aac.amp_activity_id))) ORDER BY a.amp_activity_id;;;
